statements: DELETE FROM celebrity_fashion_trends WHERE celeb_name = 'Jennifer Lopez';
DELETE FROM celebrity_fashion_trends WHERE celeb_id = 1 AND celeb_name = 'Taylor Swift';
DELETE FROM celebrity_fashion_trends WHERE popular_color = 'Red' AND popular_style = 'Bohemian';
DELETE FROM Styles WHERE style_name = 'Boho' AND celebrity_id = 5;
DELETE FROM fashion_trends WHERE popularity >= 100 AND trend_type = 'Fashionable';
DELETE FROM celebrity_outfits WHERE celebrity_id = 2 AND outfit_id = 3;
DELETE FROM outfits WHERE outfit_name = 'Casual Summer Outfit';
DELETE FROM celebrity_outfits WHERE celebrity_id = 101 AND outfit_id = 201;
